bookdash.org

Every child should own a hundred books by the age of five. To that end, Book Dash gathers
creative volunteers to create new African storybooks that anyone can freely print, translate and
distribute. Then we work with partners to give those books to preschool children to own.

To find out more, and to download beautiful, open-licensed, print-ready books, visit bookdash.org.

Amahile wants to help!

Illustrated by Kelly Brown

Written by Refilwe Nsibande

Designed by Monique Cleghorn

Edited by Katie Huston

with the help of the Book Dash participants in Cape Town on 14 October 2023.

ISBN: 978-1-77623-037-2

Amahle wants to help!

Kelly Brown * Refilwe Nsibande * Monique Cleghorn

Every time Amahle wants
to help, all she hears is “NO”.

Mama picks up Amahle’s toothbrush.
“Mama, can | squeeze the toothpaste?”

But Mama saus...

Baba is looking for his keys.
“Baba, can | drive your bakkie?”

But Baba saus...

Mkhulu’s chickens are clucking outside.
“Mkhulu, can | feed the chickens?”

But Mkhulu saus...
